LanguageData.GotMarried.stages.got_married_to.label: {0}と結婚しました
LanguageData.GotMarried.stages.got_married_to.descrip: 結婚しました!,二人の新しい生活が始まり,とても素晴らしい.
二人がお互いに未来を作っていこうとしている光景を,目にできたことは素晴らしい.
LanguageData.AttendedParty.stages.attended_party.desc: パーティに参加して素晴らしい時間を過ごせた.
I enjoyed listening to that performance.
LanguageData.HeldConcert.stages.held_concert.label: held concert
LanguageData.HeldConcert.stages.held_concert.descript: They loved me. They really loved me.
LanguageData.TerribleSpeech.stages.terrible_speech.de: That speech was atrocious. It made me realize how little hope we really have.
LanguageData.UninspiringSpeech.stages.uninspiring_spe: That speech was more awkward than inspiring. If that's who we're listening to, I'm worried.
LanguageData.EncouragingSpeech.stages.encouraging_spe: That speech made me feel like we have a solid path forward.
LanguageData.InspirationalSpeech.stages.inspirational: That speech was moving emotionally and intellectually. I am filled with purpose.
